commits.message: Remove Rails environment methods defined on Object, which are very easy to accidentally override. Best use something like  Rails.env.test? to run env-dependent logic.

commits.author: Maxim Chernyak
commits.message: Stop loading badges into constant, use I18n instead, since they're already in locale dir. (This was breaking Rails 2.3.10, since it doesn't allow not having top-level 'en' in locale file.)

commits.author: Maxim Chernyak
commits.message: The positive branch of this condition will never be executed, because render_comments is only ever called from _comment_item partial, and that partial is only ever rendered using activity_out helper. That helper renders partials based on activity's their item_type, hence it will only render _comment_item when item_type is 'Comment', and never 'Status'.
